mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS id, m.name AS name, m.price AS price, om.quantity AS quantity FROM ordered_menu om JOIN menu m ON om.menu_id = m.id WHERE om.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, user_name, user_email, user_address, created_at, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userAddress}, NOW(), #{status})
INSERT INTO ordered_menu (order_id, menu_id, quantity) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{menuId}, #{quantity})
